definitions.definition: A geographic region of Horn of Africa ; the region of the Tigrinya-speaking peoples
A region of Ethiopia ; the northernmost region of Ethiopia; in full, Tigray Region .
A former province of Ethiopia ; predecessor to the Tigray Region in the Ethiopian Empire; in full, Tigray Province .

main_definition: A geographic region of Horn of Africa ; the region of the Tigrinya-speaking peoples
secondary_definitions: A region of Ethiopia ; the northernmost region of Ethiopia; in full, Tigray Region .
( historical ) A former province of Ethiopia ; predecessor to the Tigray Region in the Ethiopian Empire; in full, Tigray Province .
